subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: Until the fifth inning Game 3 stayed close, but the Yankees’ bats rallied in the late innings, while the Phillies’ hitters struggled to put runs on the board after an early surge.
snippet: Until the fifth inning Game 3 stayed close, but the Yankees’ bats rallied in the late innings, while the Phillies’ hitters struggled to put runs on the board after an early surge.
